sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar color="secondary">
    <ion-title>
      TO-DO!
    </ion-title>
    <ion-buttons slot="end"> 
      <ion-button (click)="addItem()"> 
        <ion-icon name="add-outline"></ion-icon>
      </ion-button>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-list>
  <ion-item *ngFor="let item of items">
    <ion-label>{{ item.title }}</ion-label>
    <ion-buttons slot="end">
      <ion-button (click)="editItem(item)">Editar</ion-button>
      <!-- <ion-button (click)="deleteItem(item)">Deletar</ion-button> -->
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-item>
</ion-list>
